snippet.title: Painkiller - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🤘 Painkiller is back: bloodier and more brutal than ever! Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled experience that brings you epic co-op action, relentless waves of enemies, and devastating weaponry designed to chew through the underworld. Team up with friends and stand strong together against demonic forces in this explosive comeback, heading to Steam, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S in Fall 2025!

⛧ Rip open the gates of the underworld and unleash chaos!

Wishlist now to be the first to step into the carnage: 

🖤 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2300120/
💙 PlayStation 5: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013491
💚 Xbox Series X|S: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/p/9NMSW622HWNH


=====[FOR MORE]=====
https://saber.games/painkiller/

=====[FOLLOW PAINKILLER]=====
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/painkillergame_/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/painkillerthegame/ 
X: https://twitter.com/painkillergame_ 
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@painkillergame_ 

=====[3D REALMS]=====
X: https://twitter.com/3DRealms
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/official3dr/ 
Discord: https://discord.gg/3drealms 

=====[SABER INTERACTIVE]=====
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/saber.games/  
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SaberInteractive   
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@saber.interactive    
X: https://twitter.com/SaberGames 

#PainkillersBack #PurgatoryAwaits #futuregamesshow
